name: Engineering
description: Responsible for software development, system architecture, and technical innovation. Our engineering team builds and maintains the core platform and develops new features.

name: Product
description: Drives product strategy, roadmap planning, and feature prioritization. Works closely with engineering and design to deliver exceptional user experiences.

name: Design
description: Creates intuitive user interfaces and engaging user experiences. Responsible for visual design, prototyping, and design system maintenance.

name: Marketing
description: Develops and executes marketing strategies to drive growth and brand awareness. Manages content creation, campaigns, and customer acquisition.

name: Human Resources
description: Manages employee relations, recruitment, benefits administration, and organizational development. Ensures compliance with employment regulations.

name: Finance
description: Handles financial planning, budgeting, accounting, and financial reporting. Ensures fiscal responsibility and compliance with financial regulations.

name: Sales
description: Drives revenue growth through customer acquisition and relationship management. Develops sales strategies and manages the sales pipeline.

name: Support
description: Provides excellent customer service and technical support. Handles customer inquiries, troubleshooting, and feedback collection.
